sort_by.description: Field by which the sorting will be performed

total_balance.description: Balance of all cards and wallets in the account

total_pages.description: Number of total pages. Total_records / per_page

BIN.description: The first six digits of the card.

3ds.description: Does this need a 3DS password for this type of card.

paid_amount.description: Amount paid by the user (specified in invoiceCurrency)

expected_amount.description: Amount paid by the user (specified in invoiceCurrency)

status.example: Paid | Underpaid | Locked | Expired | Canceled | Processing | Pending

url_return.description: URL to which the "Back" button will lead.

url_success.description: URL to which the user will be redirected upon successful payment.

amount.description: Number of cards to be created

currency.description: A list of allowable currencies. Pass the currency ID.

balance_from.description: A filtering parameter that specifies the minimum balance value. Only objects with balance exceeding this value are returned

balance_to.description: A filtering parameter that specifies the maximum balance value. Only objects with balance that do not exceed this value are returned

card_ids.description: A list of cards for mass action application.

finup_id.description: ID of wallet in Finup interface

paid_amount.description: Amount paid by the user (specified in invoiceCurrency)

status.example: Paid | Underpaid | Locked | Expired | Canceled | Processing | Pending

url_return.description: URL to which the "Back" button will lead.

url_success.description: URL to which the user will be redirected upon successful payment.

additional_data.description: Arbitrary data. You can specify anything.

url_status_webhook.description: The link that will receive the webhook. You can read more about it [here](/api-reference/webhookExample).

url_return.description: The link to which would be the "Back" button on the invoice.

url_success.description: This is the link to which the user will be redirected after successful payment of the invoice.

type.description: Type of invoice. Can be Regular or P2P.
